author: National Geographic
description:
How did Lesly and her three young siblings stay alive for weeks in the Amazon after a deadly plane crash? #LostInTheJungle offers an exclusive account of her awe-inspiring fight for survival. Now streaming on @disneyplus and @hulu.

title: How did four kids stay alive for weeks in the Amazon after a plane crash? #LostInTheJungle

author: National Geographic
description:
Studies show that dementia cases in the U.S. could double by 2060. That might sound grim, but it's partly because more people are living into their 70s, 80s, and 90s, when dementia is more likely to appear. Physician Keren Landman explores how dementia rates are increasing while dementia prevention is getting better—but the benefits from this knowledge aren't being shared equally.

Learn more about lowering dementia risk: https://on.natgeo.com/42b4uK8
